Name: 100 Keys To Your Heart
About the game: 100 Keys To Your Heart is a sweet puzzle platformer game where you play a cute key. You must find your way back to your owner, as you open a very important gift. Along the way, you will need to look for other keys to open doors, but you can't take them all with you ! Every key you pick up makes you heavier and unable to reach certain areas. Which one to pick up and when ? Mechanics and controls are simple , but they will make for diverse and challenging puzzles through multiple environments, each with new mechanics and new keys. Easy to pick up Challenging puzzles 4 Environments to explore 60 Keys to find 8 Secret locations to discover 3 Hours of gameplay
